title: [K-12] Online Science Education Design Utilizing Collaborative Instructional Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and online learning platform experience
context.additional_context: Applying a "one-teach-one-tech" model in a BYOD environment to divide technical and educational roles, implementing collaborative inquiry-based science lessons

learning_goals: Students must be able to accurately explain science experiment procedures with over 80% accuracy through the One Teach-One Tech model
Learners must be able to demonstrate the process of solving science problems using digital tools (virtual lab kits, collaborative boards, etc.) in a collaborative classroom environment
Perform peer evaluations according to team-designed assessment rubrics and provide at least three specific feedback points
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
